Name: Lost in Memory
About the game: You play as a girl who has shut herself in her home and refuses to leave. she must explore and find her memories if she ever wants to escape her past. 1.You will explore various areas and talk to different people to piece together the story. 2.collect your memories and us them to get to new areas and find secrets. 3.collect all your memories to win. 4.you may also find more story with hidden diary entries spread across the game. This game is inspired by Yume nikki and various classic RPG Maker horror games.
